amendment.description: To strike the limitation on payment of facilities charges assessed by the Department of State.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1407 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1407 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12499) To strike the limitation on payment of facilities charges assessed by the Department of State.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1407 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1407 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lugar.
